common.title: Welcome to Athene Network
common.ref_title: For every user you introduce who purchases the Premium Package, you will earn fantastic commissions
common.end_text: THANK YOU FOR CHOOSING ATHENE NETWORK!
common.toast_error2: Transaction failed. Please check your connection and try again!
common.upgrade_success: Upgrade successful. System is upgrading your account!

common.email_novalid: Your email is not valid. Please check again!
common.declines_transaction: The user declines to confirm the transaction.
common.declines_transaction_or_error_bet20: The user declined to confirm the transaction or the USDT balance is insufficient to complete the purchase of the package.
common.error_network: Please switch to the Binance Smart Chain (BSC) network to complete the transaction.
common.error_network_dev: Please switch to the Binance Smart Chain Testnet (BSC Testnet) network to complete the transaction.
common.error_bet20: The USDT balance is insufficient to complete the purchase
common.sub_title: Please connect your wallet to purchase our Premium Packages and get incredible benefits.
common.sub_package4: Deposit ATH to Athene Gaming and Athene Prediction
common.sub_package5: Additional benefits to enhance your experience
common.sub_purchase1: 1. Connect your wallet by clicking the button 'Connect Wallet'.
common.sub_purchase2: 2. Switch to the Binance Smart Chain (BEP20) network.
common.sub_purchase3: 3. Choose the package you want to purchase.
common.sub_purchase5: 5. Click the 'BUY' button and confirm the transaction.
common.sub_purchase6: 6. The system will automatically process transactions and update your account's package.
common.popup_information: Confirm payment of $3 for the Bronze package?
common.popup_information_package2: Confirm payment of $30 for the Silver package?
common.popup_information_end_user: You have successfully upgraded your package! The system will process to upgrade your account in a few minutes!
common.sub_package6: Entitled to profit-sharing benefits in ATH every month
common.note_package: You must purchase packages sequentially, starting from Bronze before advancing to Silver and Golden.
common.popup_information_package3: Confirm payment of $99 for the Golden package?

common.txLimitHelper: Your transaction will revert if there is a large, unfavorable price movement before it is confirmed.
common.priceImpactHelper: The difference between the market price and estimated price due to trade size.
common.liquidityProviderFeeHelper: A portion of each trade (0.25%) goes to liquidity providers as a protocol incentive. Note: The Fee may be lower than the estimated default value.
common.swapRouteHelper: Routing through these tokens resulted in the best price for your trade.
common.stakewithoutapproval: Attempting to stake without approval or a signature. Please contact support.
common.supplyLiquidityHelp: When you add liquidity, you are given pool tokens representing your position. These tokens automatically earn fees proportional to your share of the pool, and can be redeemed at any time.

common.commonBaseHelper: These tokens are commonly paired with other tokens.
common.addListHelper: Token lists are an open specification for lists of ERC20 tokens. You can use any token list by entering its URL below. Beware that third party token lists can contain fake or malicious ERC20 tokens.

common.addLiquidityDesc: By adding liquidity you’ll earn 0.25% of all trades on this pair proportional to your share of the pool. Fees are added to the pool, accrue in real time and can be claimed by withdrawing your liquidity.
